<b0>Create Alternative Translation</b0>: makes the segment unique.
<b0>Crea traduction alternative</b0>: rende le segmento unic.
<b0>Mark Non-Unique Segments</b0>: identical segments are marked in grey (changes the display, but not the behaviour).
<b0>Marca segmentos non unic</b0>: segmentos identic es marcate in gris (cambia le apparentia, ma non le comportamento).
<b0>None</b0> (default behaviour): all identical segments are automatically translated the same way.
<b0>Necun</b0> (comportamento base): omne le segmentos identic es automaticamente traducite al mesme maniera.
<b0>Remove Translation</b0>: deletes the content of the segment, causing (when Enter is pressed) the default translation to be inserted.
<b0>Remove traduction</b0>: dele le contento del segmento, causante le insertion (quando es pressate Enter) del traduction base.
<b0>Use as Default Translation</b0>: causes the active segment to be made the default translation and therefore all previous "default translation" segments to be brought into line with it.
<b0>Usa como traduction base</b0>: rende le segmento active "traduction base" e ergo omne le previe segmentos "traduction base" a alineate con illo.
<e0>Any char key,</e0> if clicked outside editable segment, will be ignored.
<e0>Qualcunque clave character,</e0> si cliccate foras del segmento modificabile, essera ignorate.

<e0>The user interface</e0>,<e1>Main Menu and Keyboard Shortcuts</e1>: these two chapters are likely to be heavily consulted, since they explain the user interface of OmegaT and the functions available via the main menu and the keyboard shortcuts.

<e0>Le interfacie del usator</e0>,<e1>Menu Principal e Vias Breve del claviero</e1>: iste duos capitulos debe probabilemente esser pesantemente consultate, pois que illos explica le interfacie del usator de OmegaT e le functiones utilisabile via le menu principal e le vias breve ex claviero.
<e0>Translation memories: </e0> explains the role of the various subdirectories containing translation memories, and provides information on other important aspects relating to translation memories.
<e0>Memorias de traduction: </e0> explica le rolo del varie subcamisas continente memorias de traduction, e provide informationes re altere importante aspectos del memorias de traduction.
<e0>Translation memories: </e0> explains the role of the various subfolders containing translation memories, and provides information on other important aspects relating to translation memories.
<e0>Translation memories: </e0> explains the role of the various sub-plicas containing translation memories, and provides information on other important aspects relating to translation memories.
<e0>Translation memory:</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1> stores your translations in a translation memory file.
<e0>Memoria de traduction:</e0><a1> OmegaT </a1>archiva tu traductiones in un file memoria de traduction.
<e0>Translation process:</e0> Imagine having to translate something; from a single file to a folder containing subfolders each with a number of files in a variety of formats.
<e0>Processo de traduction:</e0> Figura te de deber traducer alique; ab un sol file a un classificator continente subcamisas, cata con plure files in un varietate de formatos.
<e0>VCS client: </e0>To interface with the server an SVN or Git client must be installed on computers of "project managers" involved in the OmegaT project.
<e0>Le cliente VCS: </e0>Pro tu interfacie con le server debe esser installate un cliente SVN o Git sur le computatores del "administratores del projecto" implicate in le projecto OmegaT.
<e0>VCS server - </e0>i.e. SVN or Git server is the environment where the common material is kept and maintained on the net.
<e0>Le server VCS - </e0>id es le server SVN o le GIT es le ambiente ubi le material commun es conservate e mantenite sur le rete.

<e0>Working with plain text</e0> and <e1>Working with formatted text</e1>: these two chapters explain certain important points concerning texts to be translated, such as the encoding set (in the case of plain text files) and tag handling (in the case of formatted text).

<e0>Laborar con texto plan</e0> e <e1>Laborar con texto formate</e1>: iste duos capitulos explica alcun importante punctos re le textos a render, como le codification (in le caso del files de texto plan) e le tractamento del tags (in le caso del textos formate).
<e0>XSLT</e0> (Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations): is a declarative, XML-based language used for the transformation of XML documents.
<e0>XSLT</e0> (Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations): es un lingua declarative basate sur XML, utilisate pro le transformation del documentos XML.
<e0>administrator: </e0>the person responsible for the creation and maintaining of the repository, i.e. taking care of the server side of the task.
<e0>administrator: </e0>le persona responsabile del creation e del mantenimento del deposito, id es le cura del labor del latere del server.
<e0>checkout:</e0> the operation that creates a working copy from the repository to your local computer.
<e0>discarga (checkout):</e0> le operation que crea un copia functionante ex le deposito in tu computator local.
<e0>commit: </e0>once a new local version of the checked-out material is ready, it can be committed to the repository and thus made available to the rest of the team.
<e0>consigna (commit): </e0>un vice que un nove version local del material discargate es preste, on pote lo consignar al deposito e assi lo render disponibile al resto del equipa
<e0>repository: </e0>the place where the shared material is saved and maintained, either on a local access network or in Internet.
<e0>repository: </e0>le posto ubi le material in commun es salvate e mantenite, sia sur un rete a accesso local sia in interrete.
<e0>user</e0>: a member of the team, collaborating on the common project.
<e0>usator</e0>: un membro del equipa, que collabora sur le projecto commun.

<e0>Instant start guide:</e0> this chapter is intended as an Instant Start Guide for beginners and tyre kickers, showing the complete procedure from opening a new translation project through to completing the translation.

<e0>Guida de initio rapide:</e0> iste capitulo es designate como un guida de initio rapide pro novicios e curiosos indecise, monstra le procedura complete ab le apertura de un nove projecto de traduction, per le completamento del traduction.
<f0>(</f0><f1>Do not use the "Import Source Files" function during this exercise; you can experiment with it later, on your own.)</f1> You can close this window.
<f0>(</f0><f1>Que tu non usa le function "Import Source Files" durante iste exercitation; tu pote lo experimentar plus tarde, tu sol.)</f1> Tu pote clauder iste fenestra.
<f0>Do not change any other settings, for the purposes of this tutorial.
<f0>Non cambia necun preparationes, pro le fines de iste parve instruction.
<f0>HTML is generally very tolerant of corrupted or missing tags; the result is likely to be a file which will open, but with unexpected or undesired formatting results.

<f0>HTML es generalmente multo tolerante del tags corrupte o mancante; le resultato es probabilemente un file que on potera aperir malgrado toto, ma con resultatos de formato inopinate o non desiderate.
<f0>Important:</f0> the purpose of this introduction to OmegaT is to acquaint you with the basic concepts of translation memory software.
<f0>Importante:</f0> le fin de iste introduction a OmegaT es de poner te al currente con le conceptos basic del software re le memorias de traduction.
<f0>Note: Damaged or missing tags in XML file formats, such as OpenOffice.org, are likely to result in the output file failing to open at all.</f0>
<f0>Note: le tags damnificate o mancante in le formatos del file XML, assi como in OpenOffice.org, probabilemente resultara in defecto de aperir le file de output.</f0>
<html>Per-project external commands are disabled and will not be executed.
<html>Le commandos externe Per-project es invalidate e non essera executate.
<i0>If you changed the file extension to .html, change the extension of the translated file back to .xml.</i0>
<i0>Si tu cambiava le extension del file in .html, cambia le extension del file rendite al reverso in .xml.</i0>

<s3/>(Varie lectores del tela ha methodos un pauc differente per lo facer.

<u0>LanguageTool</u0> is an Open Source style and grammar proofreading software for English, French, German, Polish, Dutch, Romanian, and a number of other languages - see the <u1>list of supported languages</u1>.

<u0>LanguageTool</u0> es un software open source, corrector de stilo e grammatica pro anglese, francese, germano, polaco, nederlandese, romaniano, e plure altere linguas - vide le <u1>lista del linguas supportate</u1>.
<u1>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u1> <i2/> can be downloaded in nearly 100 languages and can serve as a cornerstone IT glossary.
On pote discargar le <u1>Collection de terminologia Microsoft</u1> <i2/> in quasi 100 linguas e can servir como le glossario petra angular del technologia informatic (IT).
A "project" is usually synonymous with a translation job.
Un "projecto" es de costume synonyme de un labor de traduction.
A "scanned" PDF file is a file in which the PDF format merely serves as a convenient container for scans of hardcopy pages.
Un file PDF "scandite" es un file in le qual le formato PDF servi solmente como un recipiente commode pro scansiones de paginas imprimite.
A "translated" External View file is produced by entering the translation in the target column.
Un file Vista Externe "rendite" es producite scribente le traduction in le columna de destination.
A <a0>HowTo describing the tokenizers plug-in</a0> is also available.
Il es disponibile anque un <a0>Guida que describe le plugin tokenizers</a0>.

A CAT tool, as the term is generally used by translators, refers to a software program that creates a "translation memory" (TM) of a translated document, which can then be used to facilitate the translation of future documents that have significant similarity to the first.

Un application CAT, como le termino es generalmente utilisate ab le traductores, se refere a un programma que crea, ex un documento rendite, un "memoria de traduction" (TM) que pote deinde servir pro facilitar le traduction de futur documentos con significative similaritate con le prime textos
A European Commission press release (in .odt format) in OmegaT and below it the instantaneous target text displayed in Opera.
Un edition de pressa del Commission Europee (in formato .odt) in OmegaT e in sequito a illo le instantanee texto final monstrate in Opera.
A comprehensive suite of utilities for preparing files for translation in a CAT tool.
Un comprehensive suite de utilitates pro preparar le files al traduction in un instrumento CAT.
A demonstration version is available; at the time of writing, the full version costs around US$150.
Un version demonstrative es disponibile; al tempore de scriptura, le version complete costa circa US$ 150.
A general observation: "compatibility" is rarely a black and white, "yes" or "no" issue.
Un observation general: le "compatibilitate" es rarmente un question nigre e blanc, "si" o "no".
A glossary function allows the user to enter source words and their translations into a file which can be accessed while translating.
Un function glossario permitte al usator de entrar parolas del lingua original e lor traductiones in un file accessibile durante le traduction.
A list of repository URLs is provided below.
Un lista de URLs de depositos is fornite in basso.
A more comprehensive User's Manual can be called up with the "Help" menu item or F1.
Un manual del usator plus comprensive pote esser evocate con le item del menu "Adjuta" o con F1.
A note is just a comment regarding this set of source text and translation.
Un note es solmente un commento re iste collection de texto primari e traduction
A number of rule sets are provided while additional rules can be defined by the user, as described in this chapter.
Plure collectiones de regulas es fornite dum additional regulas pote esser definite ab le usuario, como describe iste capitulo.
A schematic diagram is shown below:
A diagramma schematic es monstrate in sequito:
A script (for Windows only) and procedure was recently (2008) developed enabling OmegaT users to produce Trados uncleaned RTF files for delivery at the end of their translation stage.

Un script (solmente pro Windows) e procedura esseva recentemente (2008) disveloppate pro habilitar le usatores de OmegaT a producer files non mundate RTF Trados pro livration al fin de lor grado de traduction.
A search function scans previously translated material (either in the present document or in a translation memory), so that the user can see how a word or phrase was previously translated.

Un function de recerca scruta le textos rendite anteriormente (sia in le documento actual, sia in le eventual memorias ex traductiones precedente), de maniera que le usator pote vider como un parola o un phrase esseva rendite anteriormente.
A segment normally corresponds to one sentence.
Un segmento normalmente corresponde a un phrase.
A segmentation function displays one "segment" of source text at a time (usually a sentence), and the translation is done with the source text on the screen next to the target text.
Un function de segmentation expone un "segmento" del texto primari a un vice (de costume un phrase), e le traduction es rendite con le texto original sur le schermo juxta le texto final.
A stemmer for English, for example, should identify the string "cats" (and possibly "catlike", "catty" etc.) as based on the root "cat", and "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" as based on "stem".

Un cercator del stirpe pro le anglese, exempli gratia, deberea identificar le linea "cats" (e possibilemente "catlike", "catty" etc.) como basate super le radice "cat", e "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" como basate super "stem".
A stemming algorithm reduces the words "fishing", "fished", "fish", and "fisher" to the root word, "fish".
Un algorithmo de cerca del stirpe reduce le parolas "fishing", "fished", "fish", e "fisher" al radice, "fish".
Abiword and LibreOffice are a word processor and an office suite respectively.
Abiword e LibreOffice es respectivemente un processor de textos e un suite pro bureau.
Abiword is a relatively small download and is very fast in use.
Abiword es un discarga relativemente parve e es in uso multo rapide.
Add or rewrite encoding declaration in HTML and XHTML files:
Adde o rescribe le declaration de codification in le files HTML e XHTML:
Add the following argument to the launch command:
Adde le argumento sequente al commando de lanceamento:
Add the following line to the text in the file:
Adde le linea sequente al texto in le file:
Adding <a0>OmegaT</a0> to your menus (KDE) or panels (Gnome)
Adder OmegaT al menus (KDE) o al pannellos (Gnome)
Additional windows are available, as well as dialogs, used to change OmegaT project settings.
Additional fenestras es disponibile, como dialogos, usate pro cambiar le preparationes del projecto OmegaT.
After checking your translation, check that you have not damaged any tags during the translation process: Tools > Validate Tags.
Post controlate tu traduction, que tu controla que tu non ha damnificate ulle tags durante le processo de traduction: Instrumentos > Valida Tags.
After completing the translation and creating the translated documents, copy the translated column from the translated file backinto the <s0>target</s0> column of the original file.
Post le completion del traduction e le creation del documentos rendite, copia le columna rendite ex le file rendite retroin le columna <s0>destination</s0> del file original.
After completing your translation, create the translated document in the usual way (Ctrl+S, Ctrl+D).
Post completate tu traduction, crea le documento rendite in le maniera usual (Ctrl+S, Ctrl+D).
After downloading OmegaT (Windows version), launch the .exe file and follow the on-screen instructions, which should be self-explanatory.
Postquam tu ha discargate OmegaT (version pro Windows), que tu lancea le file .exe e que tu seque le instructiones sur-schermo, le quales essera auto-explicative.
After entering these commands, click Stop Recording.
Post scripte iste commandos, clicca Cessa le registration.
After launching OmegaT, the main OmegaT window should appear with three panes: the Editing pane, the Fuzzy Matches pane, and the Glossary pane.

Postquam tu ha lanceate OmegaT, le fenestra principal de OmegaT deberea apparer con tres quadros: le quadro de Modifica (pro Editar), le quadro pro le Concordantias Partial (fuzzy), e le quadro pro le Glossario.
After revising the text and making any corrections, create the translated documents again and close the project.
Postquam tu ha revidite le texto e tu lo ha correcte, crea de nove le documentos rendite e claude le projecto.
After selecting and installing a suitable browser (and/or the required add-on), open your translated file in the /target folder of your project:
Postquam tu ha seligite e installate un lector del tela convenibile (e/o le add-on requirite), aperi tu file rendite in le plica /target de tu projecto:
After the source file has loaded in the Editor pane, you can close the Project files dialog.
Postquam le source file has loaded in the Editor pane, you can close the Project files dialog.
After you give your project a name, the Create New Project dialog will open.
Postquam tu ha denominate tu projecto, se displicara le dialogo 'Crea nove projecto ".
After you have translated each segment, press <k0>Ctrl+U </k0>to move to the next untranslated segment (or <k1>Ctrl+Shift+U </k1>to move to the next translated segment).
Postquam tu ha rendite cata segmento, pressa <k0>Ctrl+U </k0> pro mover al segmento sequente nondum rendite (o <k1>Ctrl+Shift+U </k1>pro mover al sequente segmento rendite).
After you have translated each segment, press <k0>Ctrl+U </k0>to move to the next untranslated segment.
Postquam tu ha rendite cata segmento, pressa <k0>Ctrl+U </k0> pro mover al segmento sequente nondum rendite.
Again, OmegaT has excellent file filters for both.
De nove, OmegaT ha excellente filtros de file pro ambos.
Again, click the main "Office" button, then Word options.
De nove, clicca le button principal de "Office", dunque Optiones de Word.
Again, free demonstration versions are available.
De nove, versiones de demonstration gratuite es disponibile.
All being well, Priorview should appear when launched as described above.
Si toto vade ben, Priorview deberea apparer quando lanceate como ante describite.
All being well, your translation will come out looking like the original, but translated.
Si toto vade ben, tu traduction venira foras con le mesme apparentia del original, ma rendite.

All existing Java class libraries can be used unchanged and without special setup; at the same time, a Java programmer can opt to just use the Rexx class from the runtime package for improved string handling in Java syntax source programs.

Omne existente librerias de classe Java pote esser usate sin alteration e sin special preparation; al mesme tempore, un programmator Java pote optar pro usar programmas fonte in syntaxe Java, solmente le classes Rexx ex le pacchetto runtime pro un tractamento del texto meliorate.
All files selected for translation in this tutorial are from Wikipedia; some projects comprise more than one file, to familiarize you with OmegaT's usefulness for such structured documents.
omne le files seligite pro le traduction in iste parve instruction es ex Wikipedia; alicun projectos comprende plure files, pro familiarisar te con utilitate de OmegaT pro tal documentos structurate.
All of OmegaT's functions are available through the menu bar at the top of the Editor window.
Omne le functiones de OmegaT es disponibile per le barra del menu a le summitate del fenestra del editor.
All other instances of the same segment that were previously the "default translation" will now be brought into line with this translation.
Omne altere occurrentias del identic segmento que esseva previemente le "traduction base" ora essera alineate con iste traduction.
All the languages have access to the OmegaT object model, with the project as the top object.
Omne le linguas ha accesso al modello a objectos OmegaT, con le projecto como le objecto culmine.
Allow the translation to be equal to source
Permitte al traduction de esser equal al fonte
Allow translated tags to be in a different order
Permitte que le tags rendite es in un ordine differente
Allows to view, add, remove or edit a note in the active segment.
Permitte de vider, adder, remover o editar un nota in le segmento active.
Almost any current version of Tcl/Tk will probably be suitable, but you must have both Tcl (the scripting interpreter) and Tk (the graphical component).
Quasi omne version actual de Tcl/Tk essera probabilemente commode, ma tu debe haber tote le duo Tcl (le interprete del script) e Tk (le componente graphic).
Alsi permitte le commandos externe per-projecto
Also check that the target language code of your project against the available vocabularies in the setup window.
Controla anque que le codice del lingua final de tu projecto contra le vocabularios disponibile in le fenestra de preparation.
Also supported is the CSV format.
Alsi supportate es le formato CSV.
Alternativemente, clicca duo vices sur le file
Alternatively, if you already know which version you wish to download, click on the link to the Download Overview.
Alias, si tu jam sape qual version tu desira discargar, clicca sur tu apte ligamine al Panorama re le Discargas.
Alternatively, you should be able to translate the Infix XML file with good results using earlier versions of OmegaT by means of the HTML filter.
Alias, tu deberea esser habile a traducer le file XML Infix con bon resultatos usante anterior versiones de OmegaT per medio del filtro HTML.
Although Infix is a Windows application, Iceni has made efforts to cater for Linux and Macintosh users.
Ben que Infix sia un application Windows, Iceni ha facite effortios pro provider al usatores de Linux e Macintosh.

Although it is debatable whether the results of this procedure will be comparable to re-layouting of the translation by a DTP professional, they are likely to be much better than conversion to completely different formats (such as RTF).

Ben que sia discutibile si le resultatos de iste procedura essera comparabile a re arrangiar le traduction con un DTP professional, illos essera probabilemente multo melio que le conversion a formatos completemente differente (assi como RTF).

Although it might seem strange to want to translate TMX files (the usual reason for creating a file filter), the addition of a TMX filter has the interesting effect that it enables TMX files in any location to be searched for from within any OmegaT project using the "Search Files" function, something not possible in the standard OmegaT build.

Ben que on poterea parer singular voler traducer le files TMX (le ration consuete pro crear un filtro de file), le addition de un filtro TMX ha Le interessante effecto que illo habilita le files TMX in omne location e esser cercate ab intra omne projecto OmegaT usante le function "Cerca files", alique non possibile in le compilation OmegaT standard.
Although many users are aware of this, their reaction is often "But I can't program!".
Etiam si multe usatores es al currente de isto, lor reaction is frequentemente "Ma io non pote programmar!".
Although this has many advantages, it can be very useful for the translator to be able to see the ultimate layout and formatting whilst translating.
Ben que isto ha multe avantages, il pote esser multo utile pro le traductor poter vider le arrangiamento ultimate e formate durante le traduction.
An <a0>OmegaT plugin</a0> is now available by means of which this format can be handled in OmegaT.
Ora es disponibile un <a0>plugin OmegaT</a0> con le qual iste formato pote esser tractate in OmegaT.

An advantage probably common to all translation memory applications is that they simplify checking: once you have completed the first draft of your translation, you can "walk" through it with the source and target versions of each sentence displayed next to each other.

un avantage probabilemente commun a omne le applicationes de memoria de traduction es que illos simplifica le controlo: un vice que tu ha completate le prime minuta de tu traduction, tu pote "ambular" a transverso de illo con le version fonte e lo final de cata phrase exponite le un proxime al altere.
An alternative to running the CodeZapper macro on your text is to "level" the formatting.
Un alternative executar le macro CodeZapper sur tu texto, is "nivellar" le formato.
An area for setting project folders
Un area pro le preparation del plicas del projecto
An error occurred while trying to create a new folder
Un error occurreva durante le tentativa de crear un nove classificator

An example is to create a dictionaries folder in your Program Files (Start > My Computer > <s0/>Local Disk (C:) > Program Files > right click > New Folder, name it dictionaries.) Then from the OmegaT menu, click Options > Spell checking.

Un exemplo es crear un plica denominate dictionarios in tu "Programmas" (Initio > Ressources del Computer > <s0/>Disco Local (C:) > Programmas > Clicca al derecta > Nove Classificator, que tu lo denomina dictionarios.) Alora ab le menu de OmegaT, clicca Optiones > Controlo orthographic.
An example script that achieves this function is described in the <a0>Priorview Howto</a0>.
Un script exemplo que compli iste function es describite in le <a0>Guida al Priorview</a0>.
An example use of this function is as follows.
Un uso exemplo de iste function es quam seque.
An important aspect of this freedom is that users may also modify the program's code.
un aspecto importante re iste libertate es que usatores pote anque modificar le codice del programma.
An intelligent command-line alignment tool for producing translation memory files from legacy texts and their translations.
Un instrumento de alineamento intelligente a linea de commando pro le production de files memoria de traduction ex precedente textos e lor traductiones.
An interesting feature of Dj Vu DVX is its "External View" file format.
Un interessante characteristica de Dj Vu DVX es su formato de file "Vista Externe" file format.

Un instrumento de gestion de dictionarios in interrete que se integra con Omegat.

Como alterubi in le projecto OmegaT, le labor de programmation de OmegaT es facite con voluntarios, e in harmonia con la philosophia del projecto, le disveloppamentos e le meliorationes que illes face a OmegaT es finalmente a lor discretion.
As for te-basic-source, but for the target text.
Como pro te-basic-source, ma pro le texto de destination.
As for te-gloss-highlight, but substitutes the source terms in the glossary with the target terms.
Como pro te-gloss-highlight, ma substitue le terminos in le glossario con le terminos de destination.

Cono es sovente in le caso con cosas technic (e cosas re le traduction), il ha alicun trappas.
As its name suggests, it is an XML-based format.
Como su nomine suggere, illo es un formato basate sur XML.

Como su nomine suggere, iste script spolia del tags le segmento (final) de OmegaT.

A mesura que de decembre 2011, Google ha requirite le pagamento ab usatores pro uso de iste servicio.

Per le arrangiamento initial, le texto primari es collate pro te in le campo de modifica del segmento final.

CAT tools allow for greater consistency of translation, including when more than one translator is working on a job.

Identify the .tmx file and the glossary (.txt) file for your language combination.

Identifica le tag(s) a nivello de paragrapho pro tu nove formato de file.

Si un file HTML contine un declaration de codification, isto essera usate in vice de qualcunque valor que tu attribue in iste dialogo.

Si Java es jam installate sur tu systema (le qual es probabilemente le caso) e tu projecta usar iste existente installation Java de systema in conjunction con OmegaT, in prime loco controla que illo es convenibile.
If Java is installed at system level and is in the command path, the full
Si Java es installate a nivello de systema e es in le via del commando,

If Options > Editing Behaviour > "Go To Next Untranslated Segment stops when there is at least one alternative translation" is selected however and at least one alternative translation of a non-unique segment has been created, this function treats all instances of that segment (whether default or alternative translations) as untranslated, i.e. does not skip them.

Si Optiones > Comportamento del modifica > "Vade al sequente segmento non rendite arresta quando il ha is al minus un translation alternative" es seligite totevia e al minus un traduction alternative de un segmento non unic esseva create, iste function tracta omne occurrentias de un segmento (si traductiones base o alternative) ut non rendite, i.e. non salta los.
If a HHC or HHK file has an encoding declaration, it will be used regardless of any value you specify in this dialog.
Si un file HHC e HHK contine un declaration de codification, isto essera usate in vice de qualcunque valor que tu attribue in iste dialogo.
If a combination you try is already assigned, a message to this effect is displayed in the dialogue, and you can delete the combination and try another.
Si un combination que tu tenta es jam assignate, es monstrate un message pro iste effecto in the dialogo, e tu pote deler le combination e experir un altere.
If a file does not loads into the Editor pane, then it could be that your source file is in a format that doesn't work in OmegaT.
Si un file non carga in le quadro 'Editor', alora es possibile que tu file primari ha un formato que non functiona in OmegaT.
If a segment has already been translated and an identical segment later on in the text is then changed, the earlier segment will be brought into line with the changed segment.
Si un segmento esseva ja rendite e un segmento identic plus tarde sur in le texto es alora cambiate, le segmento anterior essera re portate in linea con le segmento cambiate.

If after looking at the fuzzy match you decide that it is useful, you can paste it into the active segment at any point (Ctrl+I), or replace (overwrite) the active segment with it completely (Ctrl+R) and then modify it, or copy and paste parts of it into the active segment (use the mouse to mark it, then Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V to copy and paste).

Si postquam ha querite al concordantia partial tu decide que illo es utile, tu pote lo collar in le segmento active in qualcunque puncto (Ctrl+I), o reimplaciar (super scriber) completemente le segmento active con illo (Ctrl+R) e deinde lo modificar, o copiar e collar partes de illo in le segmento active (usa le mouse pro lo marcar, deinde Ctrl+C e Ctrl+V pro lo copiar e collar).
If all has gone according to plan, your macro should now work.
Si toto esseva facite secun le plano, tu macro deberea ora functionar.
If all is well, an .html version of the file will be produced:<br1/>
Si tote es ben, un version .html del file essera producite:<br1/>
If an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project contains one or more glossaries, any terms in the glossary which are also found in the current segment will be automatically displayed in the Glossary viewer.
Si un projecto <a0>OmegaT</a0> contine uno o plus glossarios, qualcunque terminos in le glossario que alsi es trovate in le actual segmento essera automaticamente exponite in le quadro "Glossario".
If an Internet connection is available, various MT services such as Google Translate and Microsoft Translator can be used from within OmegaT.
Si es disponibile un connexion a interrete, on pote usar ab interior de OmegaT, varie servicios MT assi como Google Translate.

If every single word in OmegaT is enclosed within tags, it is possible that Word has attempted to spell-check the text without access to a suitable spelling dictionary, and has therefore marked each word as mis-spelt.

Si cata singule parola in OmegaT es includite inter tags, il es possibile que Word ha tentate le controlo orthographic del texto sin accesso a un convenibile dictionario orthographic, e ha ergo marcate cata parola ut error orthographic.
If it does not, you still have the option to install a local version of Java or a different version of Java at system level.
si non opera, tu ancora ha le option pro installar un version local de Java o un differente version de Java a nivello de systema.
If it is not in your distribution's repository, you can <a0>download it from kaptain.sourceforge.net</a0>.
If illo non es in tu deposito del distribution, tu pote <a0>discarga lo ex kaptain.sourceforge.net</a0>.
If later access to the desired location is granted that location will be used and all settings will return to their defaults as a result of the location change.
Si un ulterior accesso al location desiderate essera accordate, iste location essera usate e omne preparationes retornara al lor initio a causa del cambiamento de location.
If multiple functions were to be used at the same time in practice, it would be more efficient to combine them in a single script file.
Si multiple functiones debera esser usate al mesme tempore in practica, esserea plus efficiente combinar los in un file script singule.
If necessary, edit the file names of the dictionary or change your project's language settings.
Si necessari, edita le nomines del file del dictionario o cambia tu preparationes pro le lingua de tu projecto.

Si non, essera monstrate messages de cernita que (on spera) providera alicun idea re ubi es le problema.

Si non, perque non scriber un articulo re le uso de OmegaT?

Si es activate le controlo orthographic, le errores orthographic e le lapsus es identificate e marcate pro esser correcte durante le traduction.
If the Editing pane is empty, the language of your Windows installation is probably not English and OmegaT does not have an Instant Start tutorial in your language.
Si le quadro de Modifica es vacue, le idioma de tu installation Windows non es probabilemente anglese e OmegaT non ha le parve instruction pro le comenciamento instantanee in tu lingua.
If the automatic installation process does not work: check that your Internet connection is working; if so, try a different repository URL.
Si le processo de installation automatic non functiona: controla que tu connexion a Interrete es functionante; si assi, proba un URL de deposito differente.
If the checker's changes are to be included in a translation memory repository maintained by the customer, the changes need to be made <i0>before</i0> the final documents are created.
Si le cambios del correctores debe esser includite in un deposito pro memoria de traduction mantenite per le cliente, necessita facer le cambios <i0>ante que</i0> le documentos final es create.

Si le cliente necessita le formato MS Office, salva simplemente le file final con OpenOffice.org in le pertinente formato MS (.doc, etc.)

Si le lingua de tu texto fontal non es listate, que tu selige un altere idioma que es listate, clicca duo vices sur le campo "Nomine del Lingua", e cambia lo in le abbreviation pro tu idioma.

Si le corrector orthographic es non functionante, alora face secur in prime loco que le cassa de marca <g0>"Controla automaticamente le orthographia del texto"</g0> in le dialogo del corrector orthographic (<g1>Optiones > correction orthographic...)</g1> es marcate.
If they are used by some other application on your system, they will disappear from that application, too.
Si illos es usate ab alicun altere application sur tu systema, illos disparera alsi ab celle application.

Si tu pote programmar in un altere lingua, tu pote scriber codice a supporto del application principal.

Si tu vide la file OmegaT ma non vide OmegaT.exe in tu

If you establish that the version of Java installed at system level is not compatible with OmegaT and you wish to replace this Java version with the Oracle Java version, check first whether an Oracle package is available for your Linux distribution (SUSE, Ubuntu, etc.).

Si tu constata que le version de Java installate a nivello de systema non es compatibile con OmegaT e tu desidera reimplaciar iste version de Java con le version Oracle de Java, controla in prime loco si es disponibile un Oracle pacchetto pro tu distribution de Linux (SUSE, Ubuntu, etc.).

If you have a natural aversion to reading instructions, and your approach to new software is to click on every button you see until something resembling the desired effect occurs, then OmegaT is probably not suitable for you.

Si tu ha un natural aversion al lectura del instructiones, e tu approche a nove software es de cliccar sur cata button tu vide usque alicun cosa resimilante al effecto desiderate occurre, alora OmegaT non es probabilemente convenibile pro te.

Si tu ha installate un version de OmegaT con supplite JRE, le script lanceamento supplite jam contine iste percurso pro te.

Si tu ha installate un altere version de Java ma non ha rendite lo le version de arrangiamento base a nivello de systema, tu debe includer le integre percurso del file binari Java in le commando de lanceamento.

Si tu ha facite cambios a tu Normal.dotm, tu pote voler in prime loco lo salvar.

Si tu non ha ja facite assi, adde le linguetta Disveloppator al banda ut seque: clicca sur le button Office.

If you haven't yet saved the project, this manually confirms whether you really wish to quit.

If you need assistance with any aspect of OmegaT, feel free to join the <u1>OmegaT users group.</u1>
Si tu ha besonio de adjuta pro qualque aspecto de OmegaT, que tu te adjunge gratis al gruppo <u1>Usuarios de OmegaT</u1> .

If you obtain the Oracle version of Java directly from Oracle, installation is likely to be straightforward, but you will have to configure it manually in order to make it the default version at system level.
Si tu obtene le version Oracle de Java directemente ex Oracle, le installation essera probabilemente candide, ma tu debera lo configurar manualmente pro render lo version base a nivello de systema.
If you only have a Bolivian Spanish dictionary available, with the file names es_BO.dic and es_BO.aff, you can rename these files es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff, and the spelling dictionary will work.

Si tu ha disponibile sol un dictionario boliviano espaniol, con le nomines del file es_BO.dic e es_BO.aff, tu debe renominar iste files in es_MX.dic e es_MX.aff, e le dictionario orthographic functionara.
If you place translation memory files in the /tm/ subfolder of your project folder, OmegaT will automatically search them for similar segments, called "fuzzy matches".
Si tu loca unes files de memoria de traduction in le subcamisa /tm/ de le classificator de tu projecto, OmegaT querera los automaticamente pro similabile segmentos, nominate "concordantias confuse".
If you prefer to proofread your translation on paper, print out the <f0>target document.
Si tu prefere leger le probas de tu traduction sur papiro, stampa le <f0>documento final.
If you prefer to read through the finished text on the screen, i.e., in your browser, toggle between the browser and OmegaT.
Si tu prefere leger al transverso del texto clause sur le schermo, id es, in tu lector del tela, commuta inter le lector del tela e OmegaT.
If you use OmegaT for any length of time in the future, you will want to customize the segmentation rules.
Si tu usara OmegaT per alcun tempore in le futuro, alora tu volera accostumar le regulas de segmentation.

Si tu vide iste files in tu lector del tela sur tu PC, illo pote differer legiermente in apparentia ab le paginas sur le interrete.
If you want to use the same language in OmegaT as the one used during installation, check the box below.
Si tu vole usar le mesme lingua, in OmegaT, que es in uso durante le installation, compulsa le buxo in basso.
If you wish to change the text in a segment within the current project which is displayed in the Text Search window, double-click on it and OmegaT will take you to the segment concerned.
Si tu vole cambiar le texto in un segmento intra le projecto currente le qual es displicate in le fenestra Cerca Texto, clicca duo vices sur illo e OmegaT te portara al segmento sollicite.
If you wish to keep track of what is happening to the report, register as a SourceForge user, login and file a bug report or simply click Monitor at the top of the report.

Si tu vole mantener tracia re quod es occurrente a tu reporto, registra te como un usator SourceForge, qualifica te e deposita un reporto de defecto o simplemente clicca monitor al summitate de tu reporto.
If you would like to help support the continued development of OmegaT, it would be very much appreciated - click on this link to go to the <u0> OmegaT PayPal account</u0>.
If you amarea sustener adjuta al continue disveloppamento de OmegaT, il esserea permulte appreciate - Clicca sur iste ligamine pro vader al conto <u0> PayPal de OmegaT</u0>.
If you're a programmer and you happen to know Java, we'd like to hear from you.
Si tu es un programmator e te accide de cognoscer Java, nos amara audir te.

Si tu codice esseva compilate con bon successo, le OmegaT compilate es site in:

Si tu file contine multe tal interruptiones incommode, il es plus efficiente levar los tote a un vice, commutante inter OmegaT e Infix pro vider ubi illos es.

If your project consists of multiple source files, possibly in multiple sub-folders and with accompanying graphics files, etc., as is the case with the examples in our second, HTML, project, the entire structure of the files in <f1>/source</f1> is reproduced in <f2>/target</f2>.

si tu projecto consiste de multiple files fonte, possibilemente in multiple sub-plicas e con accompaniamento de files graphic, etc, como es le caso con le exemplos in tu secundo projecto HTML, le integre structura del files in <f1>/source</f1> is copiate in <f2>/target</f2>.
If your project contains more than one file for translation, confirming the last segment in the first file will take you to the topmost segment in the second file.
Si tu projecto contine plure files pro le traduction, si tu confirma le ultime segmento in le prime file tu vadera al summe segmento in le secundo file.
If your source file is a formatted file, e.g. Microsoft Word, LibreOffice Writer or HTML, OmegaT will convert the formatting into tags that surround the text that you translate.
Si tu file primari es un file formate, per exemplo: Microsoft Word, LibreOffice Writer o HTML, OmegaT convertera le formato in tags que ambira le texto que tu va render.
If your text contains both Asian and "normal" (e.g. Latin) characters, use Ctrl+A to select the entire text, then select a single font for it.
Si tu texto contine ambe le characteres asiatic e "normal" (exempli gratia Latin), usa Ctrl+A pro seliger le texto integre, pois selige un typo de character sol pro illo.

Si, durante le installation, tu creava un via breve sur le scriptorio,
If, for whatever reason, you need to do this from time to time, it may make sense to copy the files involved to a different folder, reserved just for use by OmegaT.
Si, pro qualcunque ration, tu necessita de lo facer sovente, copia le files implicate in un classificator differente, reservate solmente pro le uso ab OmegaT.

importante: pro usar le plugins, tu pote haber necessitate de installar un version de OmegaT plus recente.
Imports units from MediaWiki pages, based on the URL entered.
Que tu importa unitates ab le paginas de MediaWiki, basate super le URL inscribite.

nota que tu pote re-assignar le vias breve ab claviero a tu preferentias personal.

OmegaT automaticamente salva le traductiones cata 10 minutas e quando tu claude tu projecto o tu quita OmegaT.

OmegaT pote alsi controlar pro variabiles de programmation (variabiles de function printf) like '%s'.

OmegaT pote esser personalisate pro supportar anque altere formatos de file.

OmegaT permitte de deler le tags e de cambiar lor ordine, ma sol si alicunes regulas es exactemente sequite.

OmegaT non ha un function de vista preliminar integrate, ma il es possibile provider plurime identic functionalitates usante additional software.
OmegaT does not have to be launched from the command line, but doing so may be useful as it provides debugging information.
OmegaT non debe esser lanceate ab le linea de commando, ma facer assi pote esser utile pois que illo provide information de cernita del defecto.

OmegaT non exeque ben sur omne versiones de Java.
OmegaT does not support these formats directly.
OmegaT non supporta directemente iste formatos de file.
OmegaT features highly customizable filters, enabling you to configure numerous aspects.
OmegaT features highly customizable filters, enabling you to configure numerous aspects.
OmegaT has a friendly and helpful user group.
OmegaT ha un gruppo del usatores adjuvante e amical.

&&&&&OmegaT has a very active,supportive and multilingual user group <a0>here</a0>, which users are strongly encouraged to join.

OmegaT ha un corrector orthographic integrate.
OmegaT has been successfully installed on Windows (all versions from 98 onwards), Macintosh OS X and Linux.
OmegaT esseva installate con bon successo sur Windows (tote le versiones a partir de Windows 98 in avante), Macintosh OS X e Linux.
OmegaT ha selecte le option 'Si' automaticamente.
OmegaT has file filters for both Open Document Format and for the Star Office format which it replaced.
OmegaT ha filtros de file pro ambe Open Document Format e pro le formato Star Office que illo replaciava.
OmegaT has rudimentary support for XLIFF, and a procedure for using XLIFF in OmegaT in conjunction with the Rainbow tools can be found <a0>here</a0>.
OmegaT ha un supporto rudimentari pro XLIFF, e un procedura pro usar XLIFF in OmegaT conjunctemente con le applicationes Rainbow pote esser trovate <a0>hic</a0>.
OmegaT in the command line mode
OmegaT in modo linea de commando
OmegaT is a computer-assisted translation (CAT) tool.
OmegaT es un instrumento pro traduction adjutate ab computator (CAT).

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.

OmegaT es un instrumento gratuite de traduction assistite ab computator, multe-platteforma con concordantia partial, recerca con parola clave, glossarios, e fruition del translation in le renovation del projectos.
OmegaT is a free translation memory application written in Java.
OmegaT es un programma gratuite pro memoria de traduction, scripte in Java;
OmegaT is a free, open-source translation memory program.
OmegaT es un programma gratuite pro memoria de traduction, open-source..
OmegaT is able to store translations that are identical to the source.
OmegaT es capabile de registrar traductiones que es identic al texto primari.
OmegaT is also capable of reading glossaries in TBX, the industry-standard format for glossary files.
OmegaT is alsi capabile de leger glossarios in TBX, le formato standard del industria pro files glossario.
OmegaT is among the CAT tools for which this process can be used.
OmegaT es un application CAT pro le qual iste processo pote esser utilisate.

OmegaT is an "inline" translation memory application, meaning that you see only one copy of the text; segments which have already been translated appear as such, otherwise <t0/>the untranslated source text is displayed.

OmegaT es un application pro memoria de traduction "inline", in le senso que tu vide solmente un copia del texto; le segmentos jam rendite appare tal qual, de altere maniera es exponite <t0/>le texto primari non rendite.
OmegaT is an excellent place to start, as the price is right, it is relatively easy to learn, and it runs on MAC and under Linux, as well as Windows.
OmegaT es un excellente medio pro mitter se in cammino, pois que le precio es correcte, illo es relativemente facile a apprender, e illo functiona in MAC e sur Linux, como sur Windows.
OmegaT is an open-source application and project.
OmegaT es un application e un projecto open-source.
OmegaT is available in many different versions in order to suit a range of user requirements.
OmegaT es disponibile in multe distincte versiones pro convenir a numerose requisitos del usator.
OmegaT is capable of handling the current Microsoft Office formats directly, without conversion to or from other formats.
OmegaT is capabile de tractar le actual formatos de Microsoft Office directemente, sin conversion verso o a partir de altere formatos.

OmegaT is generally observant of the conditions and tolerant of other tools' failure to observe them; should problems arise here, however, they can generally be resolved fairly easily by a search & replace in a text editor of the illegal character in the TMX file.

OmegaT generalmente observa le conditiones del alteres applicationes e tolera lor fallimentos de los observar; problemas que deberea levar se hic, tamen, pote generalmente esser resolute assatis facilemente con un recerca & reimplacia in un editor de texto del character illegal in le file TMX.
OmegaT is not particularly difficult to install or use, but it does require a willingness to read and follow the instructions.
OmegaT non es particularmente difficile a installar o usar, ma illo require bon voluntate pro leger e sequer le instructiones.
OmegaT is refused access to the system property containing the name of your OS and/or the system property containing your home folder.
A OmegaT es refusate le accesso al proprietate del systema continente le nomine de tu OS o al proprietate del systema continente tu plica base.
OmegaT is supplied ready-compiled for a number of platforms, including a cross-platform version.
OmegaT es supplite preste compilate pro un numero de platteformas, includente un version multe platteforma.
OmegaT is supplied with a number of very basic segmentation patterns.
OmegaT es supplite con un numero de patronos de segmentation maxime basal.
OmegaT is the original work of Keith Godfrey.
OmegaT es le opera original de Keith Godfrey.
OmegaT is to use Java Web Start.
OmegaT es: usar le Java Web Start.
OmegaT is tolerant when reading TMX files: it will accept files with en-GB, en-US, en, EN, etc.
OmegaT es tolerante in le lectura del files TMX: il acceptara files con en-GB, en-US, en, EN, etc.
OmegaT isn't just a product; it's an exciting project, and you can be part of it.
OmegaT non es justo un producto; illo es un excitative projecto, e tu pote esser parte de illo.
OmegaT leaves the editing field blank.
OmegaT lassa blanco le campo del modifica.
OmegaT main window contains the main menu, status bar and several panes.
Le fenestra principal de OmegaT contine le menu principal, le barra del stato e plure quadros.
OmegaT on Wikipedia (at the time of writing, in fifteen languages).
OmegaT sur Wikipedia (al tempore de scriptura, in quindece linguas).
Le pacchettos de OmegaT le qual ingloba
OmegaT ran out of memory, and will quit when you press OK.
OmegaT curreva foras de memoria, e quitara quando tu pressa OK.
OmegaT runs on any operating system on which a suitable version of the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) can be run.
OmegaT essera habitualmente exequite sur omne le systema operative sur le qual pote esser installate un convenibile version del Java Runtime Environment (JRE).
OmegaT shares this problem with other CAT tools that handle the .docx format, and the solutions are similar or the same.
OmegaT divide iste problema con altere applicationes CAT que tracta le formato .docx, e le solutiones es simile o identic.
OmegaT stores your translations and proposes possible translations from similar segments in previous memory files.
OmegaT registra tu traductiones e propone eventual traductiones ab segmentos simile in previe memorias de traduction.
OmegaT stores your translations and proposes possible translations from similar segments in registered in the translation memory files.
OmegaT registra tu traductiones e propone eventual traductiones ab segmentos simile registrate in le files memoria de traduction.
OmegaT supports all current versions of TMX, but is likely to deliver better match results if the TMX file is version 1.4b.
OmegaT supporta omne le versiones actual de TMX, ma es probabile delivrar melior resultatos de concordantia si le file TMX es version 1.4b.
OmegaT supports language codes in the format "xx", "XX", "xx-YY" and "XX-YY", where xx or XX is the language, yy or YY the region.
OmegaT supporta codices del lingua in le formato "xx", "XX", "xx-YY" e "XX-YY", ubi xx o XX es le lingua, yy o YY le region.
OmegaT supports the following file formats out of the box:
OmegaT supporta le formatos de file sequente:
OmegaT supports two of the popular version control systems (VCS for short), <u0>Apache Subversion</u0> (often abbreviated SVN, after the command name svn) and <u1>Git</u1>.

OmegaT supporta duo del popular 'systemas de controlo de version' (Version Control Systems = VCS in pauco), <u0>"Subversion" ex Apache</u0> frequentemente abbreviate in SVN, secundo le nomine del commando svn) e <u1>Git</u1>.
OmegaT uses glossaries containing translations of single words or small phrases: a simplified bilingual dictionary for a specific domain.
OmegaT usa glossarios continente traductiones de parolas singule o parve phrases: un dictionario bilingue simplificate pro un specific dominio.
OmegaT uses the international TMX standard as its native translation memory format.
OmegaT usa le standard TMX international qua formato de memoria de traduction su native.

OmegaT uses the standard tmx file format to store and access translation memories, which guarantees that you can exchange your translation material with other CAT applications supporting this file format.

OmegaT usa le formato de file TMX standard pro registrar e acceder le memorias de traduction, le qual garanti que tu pote excambiar tu material de traduction con altere applicationes CAT que supporta le mesme formato de file.
OmegaT uses translation memories to store your previous translations and then suggest likely translations for the text you are currently working on.
OmegaT usa le memorias de traduction pro registrar tu previe traductiones e alora suggere traductiones verosimilante pro le texto que tu es actualmente traducente.
OmegaT will automatically parse even the most complex source folder
OmegaT analysara automaticamente etiam le plus complexe hierarchias de classificatores primari,

OmegaT will now run on the OpenJDK Java implementation supplied with some Linux distributions, but some functions (such as the full set of command-line options) may not be available; a different font set may be supplied; and some glitches have been reported, such as with window display and the segmentation function.

OmegaT ora essera exequite sur le installation Java OpenJDK supplite con alicun distributiones de Linux, ma alicun functiones (assi como le suite de optiones del linea de commando) pote non esser disponibile; pote esser supplite un serie de typo de characteres; e qualque defectos esseva reportate, assi como con monstra de fenestra e le function de segmentation.
OmegaT will present one segment at a time for you to translate.
OmegaT proponera a te un segmento a un vice, pro render lo.
OmegaT will run on any system on which the JRE (Java Runtime Environment) has been or can be installed.
OmegaT essera habitualmente exequite sur omne le systema operative sur le qual on pote installar un convenibile version del Java Runtime Environment (JRE).
OmegaT will run on the open-implementation source Java
OmegaT currera super le libere-execution primari Java

archivo OmegaT zip o tar.bz2 in iste classificator e lo discassa ibi.

un vice (que) isto esseva copiate o ligate a tu percurso de execution (facite automaticamente si tu usa le script de installation fornite), tu pote lancear OmegaT pressante le pulsante <i0>Alt+F2</i0>, pois scribente <i1>omegat</i1> e confirmante con ENTER.

Since it is a standard, an advantage of XLIFF is that file filters provided by one CAT tool vendor for conversion between a certain format and XLIFF (and, following completion of the translation workflow, back again) can in theory be used to prepare files in the format concerned for translation in any CAT tool capable of supporting XLIFF.

Pois que il es un standard, un avantage de XLIFF es que le filtros de file supplite per un CAT tool venditor pro le conversion inter un certe formato e XLIFF (e, postere le completamento del fluxo de labor del traduction, de nove al reverso) pote in theoria esser usate pro preparar files in le formato concernite pro traduction in qualcunque application CAT que supporta XLIFF.
Since it is standard procedure for professional translators to receive and deliver texts in digital form, users of OmegaT are naturally interested in its compatibility with other software products.

Pois que il es procedura standard pro le traductores professional reciper e committer textos in forma digital, le usatores de OmegaT es naturalmente interessate a lor compatibilitate con altere productos software.

Since the legacy .tmx files in the <f1>/tm</f1> folder are the product of previous translation jobs, <f2>you will not normally have any useful legacy .tmx files to call upon until you have completed a few jobs in OmegaT, and placed them into the </f2><f3>/tm</f3><f4> folder of your new job.</f4>

Alicun del dictionarios non ha series attaccate - id es lor uso es "gratuite", e altere, como le selection supra, es sub Le licentia GPL.

Alicun altere applicationes CAT es capabile de importar e exportar files glossario in iste formato, o in un formato de texto simple simile que pote esser producite de illo multo facilemente (per exemplo per un operation cerca & reimplacia in Microsoft Word).

Le files TMX es in le codification Unicode, ma pote esser UTF-8 o UTF-16.

Le files TMX es legite un linea al vice, ordinate secundo lor nomines e segmentos, intra un file TMX date.

Files TMX de localisationes del documentation de OmegaT e de iste sito, pro le uso ab localisatores.

que le utilitate de conversion de file es installate debitemente e es functionante.

Le clave "Shift" non exhibi ulle special comportamento per se: quando on pressa le clave "Shift" , omne le claves move le cursor in su consuete faction, foras que in le caso del combination <l0>Shift+Enter</l0>, que insere un interruption de linea in le texto.

The "Shift" key doesn't exhibit any special behavior per se: when the "Shift" key is pressed, all keys move the cursor in their usual manner, except in the case of the <l0>Shift+Enter</l0> combination, that inserts a line break into the text.

The "level1" and "level2" memories can be shared with users of other translation programs.
Le memorias "level1" e "level2" pote esser usate in commun con le usuarios de altere programmas de traduction.

The "prepared" form is typically the tool's bilingual file format.
Le forma "preparate" es typicamente le formato de file bilingue del application.
The '*' character matches zero or more characters (the search term 'run*' would match 'run', 'runs', and 'running', for example).
Le character '*' concorda zero o plus de characteres (le expression de recerca 'run*' concordara pro exemplo 'run', 'runs', e 'running').
The '?' character matches exactly one character ('run?' would match 'runs' and 'rung', for example, but not 'run' or 'running').
Le character '?' concorda justo un character ('run?' concordara 'runs' e 'rung', exempli gratia ma non 'run' or 'running').

Le formato .docx es alsi pron al introduction de codice de formato "enoiose" que resulta in un apparition de tags importun e inutile in le quadro del modifica (editor) de OmegaT.

Il es alsi necesse le <a1>Java Development Kit</a1> (JDK).

The easiest way for a customers to ensure that these two conditions are met is for them to pretranslate the text themselves before passing it to the translator (thereby defining how it is segmented), and to create the translation memory in the CAT tool of their choice after receiving the translated intermediate bilingual file from the translator (thereby ensuring that the formatting information contained within the translation memory will be compatible with future projects).

Le modo plus facile pro un cliente de assecurar se que iste duo conditiones es complite, es de pre traducer le texto ipse avante que passar lo al translator (assi definiente como illo es segmentate), e crear le memoria de traduction in le application CAT de su selection, depost que recipeva le file bilingue intermedie rendite ab le traductor (assi assecurante se que le informationes de formato continite in le memoria de traduction essera compatibile con le projectos futur).

The rule-based segmentation is usually synonymous with sentence-based segmentation.

The selected languages will then be installed and will eventually appear in your spell checker setup window (this may take a while).

Le tags es monstrate in un differente typo de character pro render los minus intrusive.

Le tags in OmegaT es gris, assi illos es facile a recognoscer.
The term "Move to inside segment" means, that the cursor moves to the beginning of the segment if it was previously before the segment, and to the end of the segment if it was previously after it.
Le termino "mover se a le interior del segmento" significa, que le cursor se move al comenciamento del segmento si il esseva avante que le segmento, e al fin del segmento si il esseva depost.

Le function de exportation del texto exporta datos ex le projecto OmegaT currente in files de texto simple.

Le tertie option, id es installar un version de OmegaT con Java includite a nivello local, es semper le option "secur", e es recommendate.

The traditional Wordfast translation memory file format is of particular interest owing to its simplicity: it consists of a plain-text file with a translation unit (segment) on each line in which the source and target are separated by a tab.

Le traditional formato de memoria de traduction de Wordfast es de particular interesse debite a su simplicitate: il consiste de un file de texto simple con un elemento de traduction (segmento) sur cata linea in le qual le origine e le destination es separate con un tabulation.

Le traductor ha un texto continente le phrase "abc", e ha clause un prime minuta de illo, rendente "abc" quam "abc".

Le usator pote in consequentia vider immediatemente que un segmento in gris, plus tosto que nigre, esseva jam verificate.

Le usator qui necessita tractar files MS Office trovara adjuvante los converter con le programma gratuite Open Office que lege le formatos MS e converte los in 'open format'; postquam le traduction es clause, le files pote esser salvate, si desiderate, in formato Microsoft.
The warning takes the form of the text in the script window being highlighted in yellow.

Then enter the launch command itself, and confirm with ENTER.
Ergo inscribe le commando ipse de lanceamento, e confirma con ENTER.
Then move the end of the highlighting one character to the left so that it does not include the paragraph mark.
Pois move le fin del marca un character al sinistre de sorta que il non include le marca del paragrapho.
Then on the right, under Macros, select levelformat (or whatever you called your macro).
Pois al dextra, sub Macros, selige "levelformat" (o qual que sia tu ha lo nominate).

Pois salva le cambios e re exporta le PDF al file XML (e cambia le extension del file etc.), e recarga tu projecto OmegaT.
Then select "Paste Special" (Word 2003) or click on the arrow at the bottom of the "Insert" button (Word 2007) to obtain the extended Paste options.
Pois selige "Colla Special" (Word 2003) o clicca sur le sagitta al base del button "Insere" (Word 2007) pro obtener le optiones Colla extendite.
Then tick the "Export the segment to text files" box.
Pois marca le cassa: "Exporta le segmento in files de texto".
Then use File > Open to open any short MS Word document in the source language.
Dunque usa File > Aperi pro aperir qualcunque curte documento MS Word in le lingua initial.
Then while translating from Canadian French your project will use all the rules defined for all the language chain in the correct order.
Alora in le traduction ab le francese canadian tu projecto usara omne le regulas definite for omne le catena del lingua in le correcte arrangiamento.

There are at least three reasons why a customer may request delivery of a translation in a particular bilingual file format (rather than simply delivery of the translated file and possibly also the translation memory):

Il ha al minus tres rationes proque un cliente pote demandar le livration de un traduction in un particular formato de file bilingue (plus tosto que simplemente livration del file rendite e possibilemente alsi le memoria de traduction):
There are essentially two ways in which you can do this.
On ha essentialmente duo manieras pro lo far.

There are numerous ways of achiving this, but one practical solution is to use a script which "listens" for changes in the translated file(s) produced by OmegaT and then, when a change is detected, automatically launches the utility which converts the file(s) to html format in order for them to be read by the browser.

Il ha numerose manieras de obtener isto, ma un solution practic es de usar un script que "ascolta" le cambios in le file(s) rendite producite per OmegaT e alora, quando un cambio es detectate, automaticamente lancea le utilitate que converte le file(s) in formato html pro los render legibile al lector del tela.
There is a strong possibility that at some points, your translation will be longer than the original.
Il ha un forte possibilitate que a alicun punctos, tu traduction essera plus longe que lo original.
There is however considerable scope within the project for users to suggest improvements and influence the course of future development.
Il ha totevia considerabile campo intra le projecto pro le usatores per suggerer meliorationes e influentiar le curso de evolution futur.
There is no need to instruct OmegaT to use a particular spelling dictionary; OmegaT will use the correct language dictionary based upon the language codes of your project.
Il non ha alicun necesse a instruer OmegaT pro usar un particular dictionario orthographic; OmegaT usara le dictionario del correcte lingua in base al codices del lingua de tu projecto.

There is no way of translating a scanned PDF file other than to recreate the text, either by typing it out again or by OCR (optical character recognition), and to recreate the file layout from scratch.
Ma il non ha maniera de render un file PDF scandite altere que recrear su texto, o per dactylographia o per OCR (recognition optic del character), e recrear le arrangiamento del file ab ovo.

Pro discoperir qual tags de paragrapho deberea esser, examina un file exemplo in un editor de texto.
To find the version most suitable for you, follow the link below to the Download Selector.
Pro trovar le version maxime convenibile pro te, seque le ligamine al Selector del discarga, in basso.

To get involved in the <a3>OmegaT</a3> development effort you can join the developer group, via the web or by sending an email to <u4>omegat-development-request@lists.sourceforge.net</u4> with "subscribe" as the subject line.

Pro devenir implicate in le effortio de disveloppamento de <a3>OmegaT</a3> tu pote adherer al gruppo de disveloppatores, viaTTT o con un email a <u4>omegat-development-request@lists.sourceforge.net</u4> con "subscribe" como linea de subjecto.
To install <a0>OmegaT</a0>, double-click on the program you have downloaded.
Pro installar OmegaT, clicca duo vices sur le programma que tu ha discargate.
To install OmegaT, simply create a suitable folder for OmegaT.
Pro installar OmegaT, simplemente crea un commode plica pro OmegaT.
To install Priorview, simply unpack the zip archive at any suitable location on your hard drive.
Pro installar Priorview, discassa simplemente le archivo zip in un location convenibile sur tu disco dur.

Seque iste procedura pro installar le dictionarios orthographic:

Pro affiliar se, simplemente "Signa te" con tu e-mail.

Pro conservar tracia de lo que occurre a tu reporto de defecto tu pote te registrar
To launch Priorview, open a command prompt/terminal/console and type in:
Pro lancear Priorview, aperi un prompte/terminal/consola de commando e inscribe:

Pro lancear ab le linea de commando, aperi un fenestra terminal (non necessita permissiones de radice).
To make an alternative translation the default translation, right-click with the mouse and select "Use as Default Translation".
Pro render traduction base un traduction alternative, clicca con le dextero con le mouse e selige "Usa como translation base".
To make launching OmegaT even more user-friendly, add it to your application launch menu, or place a launch icon for it on your desktop or in your desktop panel.
Pro render lanceamento OmegaT magis plus facile, adde lo a tu menu de lanceamento, o pone un icone de lanceamento pro illo sur tu scriptorio o in tu quadro scriptorio.
To make the macro available in all documents, select Normal.dotm in the "Store macro in" box.
Pro render le macro utilisabile in omne documentos, selige in le cassa "Salva macro in": Normal.dotm.
To obtain OpenOffice.org or LibreOffice, follow the link from "Third-party software" button on the left.
Pro obtener OpenOffice.org o LibreOffice, seque le ligamine ex le button " Software de tertie partes" sur le sinistra.
To participate in the development of OmegaT, get in touch with the developers at:
Pro participar al disveloppamento de OmegaT, continge le disveloppatores a:

Pro producer un traduction que es differente de le traduction base, clicca con dextera le mus intra le segmento e selige "Crea traduction alternative".

Pro remover le stato de "traduction alternative" de un singule segmento e reportar lo in linea con le "traduction base", dele simplemente le contento del segmento.

Pro resolver isto, aperi de nove in Infix le file original PDF.
To see a list of files in the project, open the Project Files dialog by pressing <k1>Ctrl+L</k1>.
Per vider le lista del files in le projecto, aperi le dialogo 'Files del projecto' pressante <k1>Ctrl+L</k1> .

Pro seliger un lector del tela differente o utilitate conversion, tu debe clauder Priorview e relancear lo.

Pro comenciar a usar OmegaT, in prime loco crea un projecto que detenera omne tu archivos, illo es tu archivos fonte, memorias de traduction, glossarios, e eventualmente tu archivo rendite.

Pro supportar financiarimente le projecto OmegaT
To test it, add some formatting to your Word document, for example by making one word bold.

Toxic was contributed by Marc Prior.
Toxic esseva contribuite ab Marc Prior.

True PDF files (sometimes called "native" or "distilled" PDF files, though "distilled" has a more precise meaning) are PDF files that have been exported from another application, usually a desktop publishing (DTP) program.

Le files PDF ver (nominate alcun vices files PDF "native" o "distillate", ben que "distillate" ha un significato plus precise) es files PDF que esseva exportate ex un altere application, habitualmente un programma de Edition al scriptorio (DTP).

Unchanged sentences are automatically translated, while updated sentences are shown with the translation of the most similar, older sentence.
Le phrases sin alteration es automaticamente rendite, dum le phrases renovate es monstrate con le traduction de phrases senior le plus similabile.

Support pro Unicode (UTF-8): pote esser utilisate con alphabetos non latin

Uninstalling OmegaT will not remove any OmegaT projects from your system, unless you have placed such projects within the OmegaT program or configuration files folder(s), which is not a good location for them in any case.

Disinstallar OmegaT non removera alicun projectos OmegaT ab tu systema, a minus que tu poneva tal projectos intra le plica(s) del programma OmegaT o del files de configuration, le qual non es un bon ubication pro illos in omne caso.
Unlike te-notags, it is possible for the translator to work in this window, then copy and paste the content in full to the OmegaT editor pane.
Dissimile de te-notags, il es possibile pro le translator laborar in iste fenestra, pois copiar e collar le contento in plen al quadro Modifica de OmegaT.
Unlike the legacy .doc, .xls and .ppt formats, these files can be handled directly in OmegaT, with no loss of formatting as a result of conversion to and from other formats.

Differentemente al vetule formatos .doc, .xls e .ppt, iste files pote esser tractate directemente in OmegaT, con nulle perdita de formato in consequentia del conversiones verso e a partir de del altere formatos.
Unlike translation memory (.tmx) files, glossary files in OmegaT are created manually.
Dissimilemente del files memoria de traduction (.tmx), le files glossario in OmegaT es create manualmente.
Que tu dispacchetta (extrahe, expande) le archivo zip.

version del file projecto non supportate ({0})!
Until you are familiar with tag handling, it is best to retain all the tags and to keep them in the same order if at all possible.
Usque tu es familiar con le tractamento del tag, il es le melior retener omne le tags e los servar in le mesme ordine del toto, si possibile.
Until/unless you do, there will be no changes to detect/display!
usque/sinon tu face lo, il essera nulle cambios a discoperir/monstrar!
Unzip the files, and put them all in the "plugins" folder located in OmegaT installation folder, that is the folder that contains the OmegaT.jar.
Que tu expande le files, e los mitte toto in le plica "plugins" ubicate in le classificator de installation de OmegaT, i. e. le classificator que contine OmegaT.jar.

Usar le lingua de installation in OmegaT
Use the level formatting macro only on paragraphs with little or no formatting.
usa le macro pro nivellar le formato sol sur paragraphos con pauc o nulle formato.

Usa le utilitate untar (o su equivalente, per exemplo<f0> winrar</f0> in Windows) pro extraher su contentos in le classificator "Dictionary" del projecto.

Utilisate pro cambiar como <a0>OmegaT</a0> comporta se quando tu itera inter le segmentos (acceder via <m1> <g2>Optiones</g2> <g3>Comportamento de modifica...</g3> </m1>, close via <k4>Esc</k4>)

Used to display the user manual (open with <k0>F1</k0>, close with <k1>Esc)</k1>

We ignore these in Project 1 only for training purposes.
Nos ignora isto in le Projecto 1 solmente pro fines de exercitation.
We provide here two projects for self-training.
Nos supple ci duo projectos pro le auto-exercitation.

Quod es un application CAT e proque illo es utile?.
What you see may instead be a characteristic of OmegaT that
Lo que tu vide pote esser in vice un characteristic de OmegaT que
Whatever the inconsistencies, omissions and straightforward errors you may find in the present version, I declare them all my own.
Qual que sia le contradictiones, le omissiones e le candide errores que tu pote trovar in le actual version, io proclama illes omne, mi proprie.

When actuated, this launches your browser with a dummy page instructing you to set the automatic refresh function, which you should then do, and then to hit Ctrl+s, Ctrl+d in OmegaT to launch automatic updating of the browser.

Quando actuate, isto lancea tu lector del tela con un pagina simulacro instruente te a preparar le function de renovation automatic, quem tu deberea dunque facer, e pois pressar Ctrl+s, Ctrl+d in OmegaT pro lancear le renovation automatic del lector del tela.

Quando es OmegaT aperte un segmento continente iste linea, le script emitte un advertimento.

Quando on passa le mouse supra le phrase sublineate, comparera un explication.
