Quando isto is facite le quadros monstra un linguetta al summitate.
When you are finished and ready to proofread your work, you can open the translated files in <f0>/target</f0> in your browser and read through them, and/or print them out for checking.
Quando tu ha tu opera clause e preste pro leger le proba, tu pote aperir le files rendite in <f0>/target</f0> con tu lector del tela e leger al transverso de illos, e/o lo stampar pro le controlo.
When you are ready to view the final product, you can export the translated files, open them in the appropriate application and view the translation in the final format...
Quando tu es preste pro vider le producto final, tu pote exportar le files rendite, los aperir con le application appropriate e examinar le traduction in le formato final...
When you are translating from HTML, you will see a lot of codes that do not need to be translated, particularly at the beginning of each file.
Quando tu rende ab un file HTML, tu videra multe codices que non necessita de esser rendite, in particular al initio de cata file.
When you find errors in the text in the browser window, make the corresponding changes within OmegaT.
quando tu trovara errores in le texto in le fenestra del lector del tela, que tu face le cambios correspondente in OmegaT.
When you have selected all of these, the Start button appears.
Quando tu ha seligite tote istos, compare le button Start.
When you left-click on the number, the selected script will run.
Quando tu clicca sur le numero, le script seligite essera exequite.

When you let OmegaT know the files that you need to translate, it looks for the files it understands based on file filtering rules, recognizes the textual parts within them, splits up the text groups according to the segmentation rules, and displays the segments one by one so that you can proceed with the translation.

Quando tu face saper a OmegaT le files que tu debe traducer, illo examina le files que comprende, con le regulas de filtration del files, recognosce le partes textual intra illos, divide le gruppos de texto secundo le regulas de segmentation e expone le segmentos uno a uno, de maniera que tu pote proceder con le traduction.
When you move to another segment, the translation is validated and stored.
Quando tu move a un altere segmento, le traduction es validate e registrate in le memoria de traduction.
When/after downloading the zip file, place it in a suitable folder, e.g., for Windows, <s0/>C:\Program Files.
Installa OmegaT postquam tu ha discargate le file zip, pone lo in un classificator convenibile, e.g., for Windows, <s0/>C:\Program Files.

Whenever you want to see what your translation will look like in its final format, press <k1>Ctrl+D</k1> to generate the translated document, which will be created in the /target/ subfolder of your project folder.

Quandocunque tu vole vider lo que essera le aspecto de tu traductiones, in su formato final, que tu pressa <k1>Ctrl+D</k1> pro generar le documentos rendite, que essera create in le subclassificator /target/ del classificator de tu projecto.

Whenever you want to see what your translation will look like in its final format, press <k2>Ctrl+D</k2> to generate the translated document, which will be created in the /target/ subfolder of your project folder.

Quandocunque tu vole vider lo que essera le aspecto de tu traductiones, in su formato final, que tu pressa <k2>Ctrl+D</k2> pro generar le documentos rendite, que essera create in le sub-plica /target/ del plica de tu projecto.
Where a paragraph contains desired formatting, you must restore the deleted formatting after levelling the paragraph.
Ubi un paragrapho contine formato desiderate, tu debe restaurar le formato delite post le nivellamento del paragrapho.
Where paragraphs do contain inline formatting (bold, italics, hyperlinks, etc.), you can either:
Ubi le paragraphos contine formato integrate (nigrato, italico, ligamines, etc.), tu pote o:
Where routine tasks are concerned, volunteers working on the OmegaT project are generally given as much freedom as possible in determining the form of their contribution.
Re le labores routinari, al voluntarios laborante sur le projecto OmegaT es generalmente date tante libertate, in determinar le forma de lor contribution, como possibile.
Where the vendor of a software product claims that his product is compatible with another piece of software, this compatibility is seldom 100%.
Ubi le venditor de un producto software assere que su producto es compatibile con un altere pecia de software, iste compatibilitate es rarmente al 100%.

Where two segments also have identical preceding and following segments (for example when an entire page appears twice in the text), they cannot be translated differently from each other in OmegaT, i.e. it is not possible to make one of them an "alternative translation".

Ubi duo segmentos ha alsi identic segmentos precedente e sequente (per exemplo quando un pagina integre compare duo vices in le texto), illos non pote esser rendite in modo differente de le un le altere in OmegaT, i.e. il non es possibile render un de illos un "traduction alternative".
Whether anti-aliasing is enabled (this is a command-line launch option, but you can also set it in the kaptain launch script)
Si es habilitate le anti-aliasing (isto es un option de lanceamento a linea de commando, ma tu pote alsi adjustar lo in le script de lanceamento kaptain)

Whether or not it is adopted depends firstly upon whether the development team considers it beneficial to OmegaT, and secondly, upon whether one of the developers is willing to do the work of implementing it.

Si il essera adoptate o non dependera in prime loco sur quanto le equipa de disveloppamento lo considera benefic a OmegaT, e secundarimente, si un del disveloppatores es ben disposite a facer le labor de lo implementar.
Whilst Priorview is running, you can:
Durante que Priorview es functionante, tu pote:
Wikipedia is subject to continual change.
Wikipedia es subjecte a perpetue cambios.
Wild card characters are not accepted.
Le characteres jolly non es acceptate.
Will Helton: his final reading of the draft has spared me a lot of embarrassment.
Will Helton: su lectura final del minuta me ha sparniate un lot de embarasso.

Windows and Linux users: if you are confident that your system already has a
Usatores de Windows e Linux: si tu es confidente que tu systema ha ja un

Windows users who are not already using Firefox can <a1>download it from www.mozilla.org</a1>; most Linux users will already have it installed, or can install it via their distributions' repositories.

Le usatores de Windows qui non es jam usante Firefox pote <a1>discargar lo ex www.mozilla.org</a1>; le major parte del usatores de Linux habera lo jam have installate, o pote installar lo con lor depositos de distribution.

With heavily tagged HTML text, you may find it convenient to keep the source text open at the same time and to toggle between the two (Alt+tab) in order to be able to see more quickly what text actually has to be translated.

Con texto HTML multo gravate ab tags, tu pote trovar commode de mantener aperte le texto fonte al mesme tempore e de commutar inter le duo (Alt+tab) pro poter vider plus rapidemente qual texto in realitate on debe render.
With heavily tagged text, you are likely to find that OmegaT yields numerous spurious fuzzy matches in which only the tags are identical, and which are not therefore useful.
Con texto multo gravate ab tags, tu probabilemente trovara que OmegaT rende numerose concordantias partial false ubi sol le tags es identic e que es dunque inutile.

With less heavily tagged text, you can delete the content of the target text field and simply type in the translation, or you can instruct OmegaT to leave it blank by default (refer to the User's Manual for details).

Con texto minus gravate ab tags, tu pote deler le contento del campo del texto final e simplemente inscriber le traduction, o tu pote maestrar OmegaT a lo lassar ordinarimente blanco (Que tu agrada referer al Manual del Usator pro le detalios).
With the "aggregate tags" function enabled, this is not possible.
Con le function "aggrega le tags" habilitate, isto non es possibile.
With the advent of Microsoft Office 2007, Microsoft Word, Excel and Powerpoint have new default file formats.
Con le advenimento de Microsoft Office 2007, Microsoft Word, Excel e Powerpoint ha nove formatos de file.
With the appearance of OmegaT Version 2.1.8, the handling of this file format in OmegaT also became much more user-friendly.
Con le apparentia de OmegaT Version 2.1.8, le tractamento de iste formato de file in OmegaT alsi deveni multo plus facile.
With this method, you may also download the "Windows without JRE" version, since the new installation will use your existing JRE.
Con iste methodo, tu pote discargar le version "Windows without JRE", perque le installation nove usera tu JRE existente.
Without preparation in this way, the original file format may be accessible to the translator.
In iste maniera, sin preparation, le original formato de file pote esser accessibile al traductor.
Without/with JRE included, i.e. the cross-platform without JRE, e.g. "OmegaT_2.1.7_02_Beta_Without_JRE.zip" and the Linux-specific version with JRE, e.g. "OmegaT_2.1.7_02_Beta_Linux.tar.bz2".

Sin/con JRE includite, id es le multe platteforma sin JRE, exempli gratia. "OmegaT_2.1.7_02_Beta_Without_JRE.zip" e le version -specific pro Linux con JRE, exempli gratia "OmegaT_2.1.7_02_Beta_Linux.tar.bz2".
Word 2007 inserts a tag at page breaks, even automatic page breaks.
Word 2007 insere un tag al interruptiones del pagina, mesmo illos automatic.
Word 2007 marks any words not in its spelling dictionary with tags, so even a couple of words which it considers to be mis-spelt will result in a plethora of tags.
Word 2007 marca omne parolas non in su dictionario orthographic con tags, assi mesmo un par de parolas que illo considera esser error orthographic resultara in un plethora de tags.
Convertitor de file TMX ex Wordfast
Wordfast TXML is the native internal format of Wordfast's new Wordfast Professional (also known as Wordfast 6.0).
TXML Wordfast es le formato interne native del nove "Wordfast Professional" (alsi note como Wordfast 6.0) del firma Wordfast.
Writeable glossary file folder entered does not exist!
Le classificator inscribite del files glossario scribibile, non existe!
XLIFF is the industry-standard bilingual file format.
XLIFF es le formato file bilingue standard del industria.
XSLT is most often used to convert data between different XML schemas or to convert XML data into web pages or PDF documents.
XSLT es maxime saepe usate pro converter datos inter differente XML schemas o pro converter datos XML in paginas TTT o documentos PDF.
You are also free to copy it and pass it on to other people.
Tu es alsi libere de lo copiar e de lo distribuer a altere gente

You can also instruct the spell checker to ignore all the occurrences of the mis-spelled word, or add it to the dictionary.
Tu pote alsi instruer le corrector orthographic pro ignorar omne le occurrentias del parola con cacographia, o los adder al dictionario.
You can automate the above procedure somewhat by creating a macro.
Tu pote automatisar satis le procedura precedente per le creation de un macro.
You can change the keyboard shortcut at any time.
Tu pote cambiar alquando le via breve de claviero.
You can check the daily usage from your Google account.
Tu pote controlar le uso quotidian ab tu conto Google.

Tu pote deler lo: selige lo e pulsa Dele.

On pote converter le files MS Office 1997/2000/2003/XP al formato MS Office 2007 per apertura in MS Office 2007 e salvamento con "Salva Como" in le formato nove.

You can create a glossary by pressing <g0>Ctrl+Shift+G</g0>, or copy existing glossaries to the<f1>/glossary/</f1>subfolder of your project folder, and OmegaT will automatically look up words in them.

Tu pote crear un glossario pressante <g0>Ctrl+Shift+G</g0> , o copiar glossarios existente in le subcamisa <f1>/glossario/</f1> de le classificator de tu projecto, e OmegaT querera automaticamente le parolas in illos.
You can create a new project for each new job, and you can add several source files to a project at a time.
Tu pote crear un novo projecto pro cata nove obra, e in vice tu pote adder plure files primari a un projecto existente.
You can create glossary entries with Create Glossary Entry in the Edit menu.
Tu pote crear entratas del glossario con 'Crea entrata glossario' in le menu 'Edita'.
You can customize existing shortcuts or add new ones according to your needs.
Tu pote personalisar vias breve existente o adde los nove ex tu necessitates.

Tu pote personalisar le script kaptain lanceamento de maniera que tu preferentias sia le preparationes initial; redige simplemente le file omegat.kaptn in un editor de texto.
Tu pote definir tags foras del torno.

You can either copy files manually, i.e. from elsewhere on your system, using your file manager; or you can use OmegaT's <e0>"Install new dictionary"</e0> function to provide a list of available dictionaries to select from.

Tu pote o copiar le files manualmente, i.e. ab alibi in tu systema, con le empleo de tu administrator de file; or tu pote usar le function de OmegaT <e0>"Installa un nove dictionario"</e0> pro obtener un lista de dictionarios ex quo lo selectionar.

Tu pote trovar information statistic detaliate in le file: {0}

Comocunque Tu pote obtener un installation plus nette e plus

Tu pote simplificar le lanceamento con le scriptura de un file script, id es un file de texto simple continente iste duo lineas.

You can still use the browser solution described above to preview the translations of these files, but you will then also need a) a converter to convert the file to .html format, and b) a utility to launch the converter automatically so that you don't have to convert the files manually.

Tu ancora pote usar le solution lector del tela describite supra pro le vista preliminar del traductiones de iste files, ma tu necessitara alsi: a) un convertitor pro converter le file al formato .html, e b) un utilitate pro lancear le convertitor automaticamente de maniera que tu non debe converter le files manualmente

You can think of LanguageTool as a software to detect errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect, e.g. mixing up there/their, no/now etc.

Tu pote usar un procedura simile pro crear un button pro tu macro:

Tu pote verificar le pagina de reporto defecto

Tu pote anque copiar le files in le classificator "Primari" de tu projectos per medio de tu favorite administrator de files e recargar le projecto con le commando "Recarga" ex le menu "Projecto".

Tu pote trovar que le segmentos es rupte per interruptiones de linea, dur, in locos incommode.

Tu pote trovar que le typo de character incastrate in the PDF non contine omne le characteres que tu necessita.

You may prefer <i0>not</i0> to use your usual browser for the preview function so as to keep it free for Internet browsing rather than having constantly to switch tabs, so you can regard installing an additional browser for the preview function as an advantage.

Tu pote preferer <i0>non</i0> usar tu lector del tela ordinari pro le function vista preliminar, como anque retener lo libere pro navigar in interrete plus tosto que deber constantemente cambiar linguettas, assi tu pote reguardar le installation de un altere lector del tela pro le function vista preliminar como un avantage.

Tu debe ancora tractar tags debitemente quando produce e modifica tu traduction, ma tu pote vider lo in un fenestra separate sin incombramento de tags ("suppa de tag").

You will put your document to be translated into the <f5>/source</f5><f6> folder; the </f6><f7>/target</f7><f8> folder will be filled with translated text as you translate the job; the </f8><f9>/omegat</f9><f10> <s11/>folder need not concern you now; the </f10><f12>/tm</f12><f13> and </f13><f14>/glossary</f14><f15> files will remain empty unless and until you create a .tmx file and a glossary and put them into those respective folders.</f15>
